page.title: 03 Wootton Primary School.
page.content: The first part of Wootton School was built in 1872 on the opposite side of High Street from the Church. The school has since been added to at various times. At the moment there are 170 children who work in six classrooms. There are seven teachers including the head. The subjects we do are mathematics, English,reading,writing, history, environmental studies and physical activities. Most of the children prefer mathematics to any other subject. We have a playing field, a small library and a computer which we use in a lot of different ways. Parts of the school need redecorating, we need two modern purpose-built classrooms, better library facilities and p.e. apparatus. However most children like the school and it is good to be here in 1985.
